Body:
expression = re.compile('[' + rfc._CONTROL_CHARS + ']')
control_character_ordinals = frozenset([127] + [x for x in range(0, 32)])
for control_character_ordinal in control_character_ordinals:
    value_to_test = chr(control_character_ordinal)
    self.assertTrue(bool(expression.fullmatch(value_to_test)), msg=
        "Character for ord '{o}' was not included".format(o=
        control_character_ordinal))
